name: Career Carnage
description:
The government offers a deal to a select few. Enter a fight to the death competition and never have to pay taxes again.

Requires two players. Make sure you launch in windowed mode, and select 640x480 as your resolution. I recommend setting it to 'Beautiful,' because there is nothing render heavy.

Note: This game was created by me and two friends for Ludum Dare 32. The game was rushed and feature creep in the beginning lead to a mediocre game, because we spent more time on assets than making the game work! We definitely learned a lot from this one!
